returns._0: The total current balance in USDC.

params.rewards: The amount of rewards to distribute

params._tranche: The address of the tranche contract
params.rewards: The amount of rewards to distribute

params.isDeposit: Specifies if the operation is a deposit.
Specifies if the operation is a deposit.

params._amount: The amount of USDC to receive

requestGov(address).details: Only callable by the current governance.

params._amount: The amount to send as a referral rebate
The amount of USDC to send

currentBalanceUSDC().notice: Retrieves the total current balance in USDC across all tranches.

distributeCollectedFeeShares(address).notice: Distributes the collected fee shares to a specified tranche.

distributeRewards().notice: Distributes the allocated rewards among junior and senior tranchesIncludes VeTranche rewards as well

getBalancingFee(address,bool,uint256).notice: Calculates the balancing fee for deposits or withdrawals.

getBufferRatio().notice: Calculates the buffer ratio based on tranche balances and pnl.

getCollateralFee().notice: Calculates the collateral fee based on the buffer ratio.

getCurrentTrancheRatio().notice: Retrieves the current ratio of reserves across tranches.

getDynamicReserveRatio(address,bool,uint.notice: Calculates the balancing fee for deposits or withdrawals post withdrawal/deposit

getProfitMultiplier().notice: Calculates the profit multiplier based on the current reserve ratio.

getReleaseRatio().notice: Calculates the release ratio based on total reserved amounts.

getReserveRatio(uint256).notice: Retrieves the reserve ratio based on a specified reserve amount.

getSeniorLossMultiplier().notice: Retrieves the senior base multiplier for loss calculations.Would be decreased if want more losses to taken from junior

getUnreservedTrancheRatio().notice: Retrieves the Ratio on unreserved Assets in tranches

receiveUSDCFromTrader(address,uint256).notice: Receives USDC tokens from a trader and applies vault fee

releaseBalance(uint256).notice: Releases balance to junior and senior tranches according to release ratio.

reserveBalance(uint256).notice: Reserves balance for junior and senior tranches based on reserve Ratio

sendReferrerRebateToStorage(uint256).notice: Sends a part of rewards as a referral rebate to storage

sendUSDCToTrader(address,uint256).notice: Sends USDC tokens to a trader
